project.name: GPS Vega Media Abanilla
project.select_master: SELECT stations.ID, stations.NAME FROM stations ORDER BY stations.ID; {0}_{1}.png 1 2
project.select_data: SELECT xyz.ID, xyz.FECHA, xyz.Z FROM xyz WHERE xyz.ID=? ORDER BY xyz.ID, xyz.FECHA;

project.name: Vega Media. CNP con umbrales 2018 y DIA
project.select_master: SELECT IPA1.COD AS COD, IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL AS COD_UMBRAL, First(IPA1.TOPONIMIA) AS TOPONIMIA, First(ACUIFEROS.NOMACU) AS NOMACU, First(ACUIFEROS.MASUB) AS MASUB FROM ((ACUIFEROS INNER JOIN IPA1 ON ACUIFEROS.COD_ACU = IPA1.ACUIFERO) INNER JOIN IPA1_UMBRAL ON IPA1.COD = IPA1_UMBRAL.COD) GROUP BY IPA1.COD, IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL HAVING (((IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL)='CSA 26-5-2018')) ORDER BY IPA1.COD; {0:d}_{1}_{2}.png 5 4 1
project.select_master_related: SELECT COD1,COD2 FROM IPA1_SELF WHERE COD1=? ORDER BY COD2 SELECT X_UTM, Y_UTM FROM IPA1 WHERE COD=?
project.select_data: SELECT IPA2.COD, IPA2.FECHA, IPA2.SITUACION, [ipa1].[z]-[pnp] AS CNP FROM IPA1 INNER JOIN IPA2 ON IPA1.COD = IPA2.COD WHERE IPA2.COD=? AND IPA2.FECHA>#01/01/2018# ORDER BY IPA2.FECHA; 3 E D R A
project.select_umbrales: SELECT IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL, IPA1_UMBRAL.PARAMETRO, IPA1_UMBRAL.UMBRAL FROM IPA1_UMBRAL WHERE IPA1_UMBRAL.COD=? AND IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL=? AND IPA1_UMBRAL.PARAMETRO=? ORDER BY IPA1_UMBRAL.COD, IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL, IPA1_UMBRAL.PARAMETRO;

project.name: Vega Baja. CNP pozos con umbrales 2018 y DIA
project.select_master: SELECT IPA1.COD, IPA1.TOPONIMIA, ACUIFEROS.NOMACU FROM ACUIFEROS INNER JOIN IPA1 ON ACUIFEROS.COD_ACU = IPA1.ACUIFERO WHERE IPA1.COD='283610202' Or IPA1.COD='283610214' Or IPA1.COD='283610212' Or IPA1.COD='283610213' Or IPA1.COD='273640128' Or IPA1.COD='273640124' Or IPA1.COD='273640125' Or IPA1.COD='273640122' Or IPA1.COD='273640123' Or IPA1.COD='273680060' Or IPA1.COD='273680057' Or IPA1.COD='273630081' Or IPA1.COD='273630082' Or IPA1.COD='273680059' Or IPA1.COD='273680058' Or IPA1.COD='273640126' Or IPA1.COD='273640127' Or IPA1.COD='273670309' Or IPA1.COD='273680065' Or IPA1.COD='273670306' Or IPA1.COD='273670304' Or IPA1.COD='273670305' Or IPA1.COD='273670307' Or IPA1.COD='273670317' Or IPA1.COD='273670302' Or IPA1.COD='273670303' Or IPA1.COD='273679002' Or IPA1.COD='273640135' Or IPA1.COD='283620141' ORDER BY IPA1.COD; {}_{}.png 1 2
project.select_data: SELECT IPA2.COD, IPA2.FECHA, IPA2.SITUACION, [ipa1].[z]-[pnp] AS CNP FROM IPA1 INNER JOIN IPA2 ON IPA1.COD = IPA2.COD WHERE IPA2.COD=? AND IPA2.FECHA>#01/01/2018# ORDER BY IPA2.FECHA; 3 E D R A
project.select_umbrales: SELECT IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL, IPA1_UMBRAL.PARAMETRO, IPA1_UMBRAL.UMBRAL FROM IPA1_UMBRAL WHERE IPA1_UMBRAL.COD=? AND IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL=? AND IPA1_UMBRAL.PARAMETRO=? ORDER BY IPA1_UMBRAL.COD, IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL, IPA1_UMBRAL.PARAMETRO;

graph.title: Evolución piezométrica sondeo {} ({}) 1 2
Vega Baja -acuífero Vegas M. y B. del Segura-

project.name: Mingogil y Alcadozo. CNP pozos con umbrales DIA 2011
project.select_master: SELECT IPA1.COD, IPA1.TOPONIMIA, ACUIFEROS.NOMACU FROM ACUIFEROS INNER JOIN IPA1 ON ACUIFEROS.COD_ACU = IPA1.ACUIFERO WHERE IPA1.COD='243330051' Or IPA1.COD='243330052' Or IPA1.COD='243380019' Or IPA1.COD='243380020' Or IPA1.COD='253350017' Or IPA1.COD='253420053' Or IPA1.COD='253420054' Or IPA1.COD='253420056' Or IPA1.COD='253420057' Or IPA1.COD='253420058' Or IPA1.COD='253420060' Or IPA1.COD='253430036' Or IPA1.COD='253430037' ORDER BY IPA1.COD; {}_{}.png 1 2
project.select_data: SELECT IPA2.COD, IPA2.FECHA, IPA2.SITUACION, [ipa1].[z]-[pnp] AS CNP FROM IPA1 INNER JOIN IPA2 ON IPA1.COD = IPA2.COD WHERE IPA2.COD=? AND IPA2.FECHA>=#01/01/1950# ORDER BY IPA2.FECHA; 3 E D R A
project.select_umbrales: SELECT IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL, IPA1_UMBRAL.PARAMETRO, IPA1_UMBRAL.UMBRAL FROM IPA1_UMBRAL WHERE IPA1_UMBRAL.COD=? AND IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL=? AND IPA1_UMBRAL.PARAMETRO=? ORDER BY IPA1_UMBRAL.COD, IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL, IPA1_UMBRAL.PARAMETRO;

project.name: Vega Media-Baja. Red piezométrica CHS
project.select_master: SELECT IPA1.COD, IPA1.TOPONIMIA, ACUIFEROS.NOMACU, IPA1.X_UTM, IPA1.Y_UTM, IPA1.Z FROM ACUIFEROS INNER JOIN (IPA1 INNER JOIN IPA1_RED_CONTROL ON IPA1.COD = IPA1_RED_CONTROL.codigo) ON ACUIFEROS.COD_ACU = IPA1.ACUIFERO WHERE IPA1.ACUIFERO='084' AND (IPA1_RED_CONTROL.red='P' Or IPA1_RED_CONTROL.red='PN') AND IPA1_RED_CONTROL.fecha_baja Is Null ORDER BY IPA1.COD; VMB_{}_{}.png 1 2
project.select_data: SELECT IPA2.COD, IPA2.FECHA, [ipa1].[z]-[pnp] AS CNP, IPA2.SITUACION FROM IPA1 INNER JOIN IPA2 ON IPA1.COD = IPA2.COD WHERE IPA2.COD=? AND IPA2.FECHA>#1/1/1901# ORDER BY IPA2.COD, IPA2.FECHA; 4 E D R A

graph.title: Evol. piez. sondeo {} ({}) 1 2
Vega Baja -acuífero Vegas M. y B. del Segura-

project.name: Cuenca Alta. Piezometría Sequía 2018
project.select_master: SELECT IPA1.COD, IPA1.TOPONIMIA, ACUIFEROS.NOMACU, ACUIFEROS.MASUB, IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL FROM (ACUIFEROS INNER JOIN IPA1 ON ACUIFEROS.COD_ACU = IPA1.ACUIFERO) INNER JOIN IPA1_UMBRAL ON IPA1.COD = IPA1_UMBRAL.COD WHERE IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL='DIA20111215' ORDER BY IPA1.COD; {}_{}_{}.png 3 1 2
project.select_data: SELECT IPA2.COD, IPA2.FECHA, IPA2.SITUACION, [ipa1].[z]-[pnp] AS CNP FROM IPA1 INNER JOIN IPA2 ON IPA1.COD = IPA2.COD WHERE IPA2.COD=? ORDER BY IPA2.FECHA;
project.select_umbrales: SELECT IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL, IPA1_UMBRAL.PARAMETRO, IPA1_UMBRAL.UMBRAL FROM IPA1_UMBRAL WHERE IPA1_UMBRAL.COD=? AND IPA1_UMBRAL.PARAMETRO='CNP ND' ORDER BY IPA1_UMBRAL.COD, IPA1_UMBRAL.COD_UMBRAL, IPA1_UMBRAL.PARAMETRO;

project.name: Sinclinal de Calasparra. Piezometría Sequía 2018
project.select_data: SELECT IPA2.COD, IPA2.FECHA, IPA2.SITUACION, [ipa1].[z]-[pnp] AS CNP FROM IPA1 INNER JOIN IPA2 ON IPA1.COD = IPA2.COD WHERE IPA2.COD=? AND IPA2.FECHA>#02/01/2018# ORDER BY IPA2.COD, IPA2.FECHA; 3 E D R A

project.name: Piezometría Ipasub selección por ACUIFEROS, FECHA últ. medida y número de medidas
project.select_master: SELECT IPA1.COD AS COD, ACUIFEROS.NOMACU AS ACU, IPA1.X_UTM AS X, IPA1.Y_UTM AS Y, IPA1.Z AS Z, IPA1.PROPIETARI AS PROPIET, IPA1.TOPONIMIA AS NOMBRE, IPA1.PROF AS PROFUNDIDAD, IPA1.Q_LS AS Q_LS, IPA1.BES AS BES, Min(IPA2.FECHA) AS FECHA1, Max(IPA2.FECHA) AS FECHA_ULT, Count(IPA1.COD) AS NMEDIDAS FROM ACUIFEROS INNER JOIN (IPA1 INNER JOIN IPA2 ON IPA1.COD = IPA2.COD) ON ACUIFEROS.COD_ACU = IPA1.ACUIFERO WHERE ACUIFEROS.NOMACU='Ascoy-Sopalmo' GROUP BY IPA1.COD, ACUIFEROS.NOMACU, IPA1.X_UTM, IPA1.Y_UTM, IPA1.Z, IPA1.PROPIETARI, IPA1.TOPONIMIA, IPA1.PROF, IPA1.Q_LS, IPA1.BES ORDER BY IPA1.COD; {}_{}.png 1 2
project.select_master_related: SELECT COD1,COD2 FROM IPA1_SELF WHERE COD1=? ORDER BY COD2 SELECT X_UTM, Y_UTM FROM IPA1 WHERE COD=?
project.select_data: SELECT IPA2.COD, IPA2.FECHA, IPA2.SITUACION, [ipa1].[z]-[pnp] AS CNP FROM IPA1 INNER JOIN IPA2 ON IPA1.COD = IPA2.COD WHERE IPA2.COD=? ORDER BY IPA2.FECHA; 3 E D R A

project.name: Piezometría IPASUB TODA
project.select_master: SELECT IPA1.COD AS COD, ACUIFEROS.NOMACU AS ACU, IPA1.X_UTM AS X, IPA1.Y_UTM AS Y, IPA1.Z AS Z, IPA1.PROPIETARI AS PROPIET, IPA1.TOPONIMIA AS NOMBRE, IPA1.PROF AS PROFUNDIDAD, IPA1.Q_LS AS Q_LS, IPA1.BES AS BES, Min(IPA2.FECHA) AS FECHA1, Max(IPA2.FECHA) AS FECHA_ULT, Count(IPA1.COD) AS NMEDIDAS FROM ACUIFEROS INNER JOIN (IPA1 INNER JOIN IPA2 ON IPA1.COD = IPA2.COD) ON ACUIFEROS.COD_ACU = IPA1.ACUIFERO GROUP BY IPA1.COD, ACUIFEROS.NOMACU, IPA1.X_UTM, IPA1.Y_UTM, IPA1.Z, IPA1.PROPIETARI, IPA1.TOPONIMIA, IPA1.PROF, IPA1.Q_LS, IPA1.BES HAVING (((IPA1.X_UTM)>60000) AND ((IPA1.Y_UTM)>4000000) AND ((IPA1.Z)>=0) AND ((Count(IPA1.COD))>=5)) ORDER BY IPA1.COD; {}_{}.png 1 2
project.select_master_related: SELECT COD1,COD2 FROM IPA1_SELF WHERE COD1=? ORDER BY COD2 SELECT X_UTM, Y_UTM FROM IPA1 WHERE COD=?
project.select_data: SELECT IPA2.COD, IPA2.FECHA, IPA2.SITUACION, [ipa1].[z]-[pnp] AS CNP FROM IPA1 INNER JOIN IPA2 ON IPA1.COD = IPA2.COD WHERE IPA2.COD=? ORDER BY IPA2.FECHA; 3 E D R A

project.name: Red piezométrica CHS
project.select_master: SELECT ACUIFEROS.MASUB, ACUIFEROS.NOMACU, IPA1.COD FROM ((ACUIFEROS INNER JOIN IPA1 ON ACUIFEROS.COD_ACU = IPA1.ACUIFERO) INNER JOIN IPA1_RED_CONTROL ON IPA1.COD = IPA1_RED_CONTROL.codigo) INNER JOIN IPA2 ON IPA1.COD = IPA2.COD WHERE (((IPA1_RED_CONTROL.red)='P' Or (IPA1_RED_CONTROL.red)='PN') AND ((IPA1_RED_CONTROL.fecha_baja) Is Null) AND ((IPA2.FECHA)>#1/1/2018#)) GROUP BY ACUIFEROS.MASUB, ACUIFEROS.NOMACU, IPA1.COD ORDER BY ACUIFEROS.MASUB, ACUIFEROS.NOMACU, IPA1.COD; {0:03d}_{1}_{2}.png 1 2 3
project.select_master_related: SELECT COD1, COD2 FROM IPA1_SELF WHERE COD1=? ORDER BY COD2 SELECT X_UTM, Y_UTM FROM IPA1 WHERE COD=?
project.select_data: SELECT IPA2.COD, IPA2.FECHA, IPA2.SITUACION, [ipa1].[z]-[pnp] AS CNP FROM IPA1 INNER JOIN IPA2 ON IPA1.COD = IPA2.COD WHERE IPA2.COD=? ORDER BY IPA2.FECHA; 3 E D R A

graph.title: Evolución de la cota piezométrica en el sondeo {} 3
